```{r library, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Problem 1

Fit the model with logit, probit, and complementary log-log links

```{r input, echo=FALSE}
data1 = tibble(dose_x = 0:4, num_of_dying = c(2, 8, 15, 23, 27), 
               total_num = 30,
               live = total_num-num_of_dying)
data1
```

Fit $g(P(dying)) = \alpha+\beta X$ using logit:

```{r logit}
# Fit GLM
fit_logit = glm(cbind(num_of_dying, live) ~ dose_x, family = binomial(link = 'logit'),
          data = data1)
summary(fit_logit) 
```
